item.content:encoded:
Most of us have this problem often to start a conversation with any stranger. Maybe this is an important call for our business, or our college club, or for ourselves. But we do not know how to start or getting the main point of our conversation.

Well this, the first time calling a stranger is known as ‘Cold Calling’. This is a trick for the people in the sales section. Recently I started an online clothing shop on Facebook. So, I have to learn this trick too. So, here I present the 5 tips that I follow for calling a new seller or buyer, 

  1. Don’t ask who’s there: 

            Often we call someone and ask that is Mr. X there. Well, we shouldn’t do this. We get the number of him/her from him/herself or a mutual contact. And also this question may not give that person a comfortable starting. In that case, we can simply give that person a salam or any good wish like, good morning sir, good evening ma’am.

      2. Introduce yourself:

           After welcoming the call, we have to introduce ourselves properly. We can not say, “Good morning ma’am, I’m Mr. Y.” There are a lot of Y’s out there. So don’t make the option to ask which Y. We can start our convo by saying that, Good morning sir, I’m Tawsif from the computer club of ‘varsity name’. Or, I am Akash from “Visual Media”.

      3. Take The Permission to talk: 

           Before starting your conversation take the permission to talk. Ask if s/he have free time to listen to you. It will be a bad impact if that person stops you in the middle of your conversation. So ask for permission after the introduction.

      4. Leave with asking information: 

           After the whole conversation takes the email address or any other phone number from that person. Also if you need a face-to-face meeting, ask for an appointment. Also, you can mail your card or your information, or your club’s details in his email. In this way, s/he also have your contacts.

      5. Miscall handling: 

           If your call is missed or rejected by the person, don’t call back-to-back. It is a bad manner. If your first call is missed, message the whole introduction part and mention that, I need to talk with you about this fact. And ask for a reply when that person is free. Now when you get the reply call immediately.
